title: Space Pirate Kled

replies.body:
kled's face reminds me of the burger king
https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/001/545/your_out_of_luck_n00b.jpg
omg yes xD

> I love the theme and direction. 
> 
> But then when I look at this, I get terrified and confused because of not being sure what they are suppose to be.
> 
> https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/339834923714347011/494193766832537601/Screenshot_2018-09-25-12-08-24.png

{{champion:240}} What was that Skaarl? Oh, I should murder the skin team? uh, if you say so.

[No prisoneeeers!](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/9/94/Kled.UltimateTheme1.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20170409073307)
Don't murder them, they do awesome skins too :(

> [{quoted}](name=Héraklia,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=F9MhE3FA,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2018-09-30T13:57:57.204+0000)
>
> Don't murder them, they do awesome skins too :(

For popular champs maybe but urgot, kled would disagree. Lucian skin was beautiful though.
I would change kled's head to be less human, have a different head gear. Other than that a really nice concept
you're right, I'm not used to draw yordles... what kind of head gear do you have in mind? :D thank you :3
something more like a helmet, or at least more appealing googles. The currnet ones have odd proportions
Yeah I don't think his googles fit him now that you say it xD

I love the theme and direction. 

But then when I look at this, I get terrified and confused because of not being sure what they are suppose to be.

https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/339834923714347011/494193766832537601/Screenshot_2018-09-25-12-08-24.png

Thanks! :D

Well since it's a harrowig skin, being terrified is a good reaction I guess xD

Since there are so many Kled players joined here interested in benefiting the champ I wanted to take the time to let you know about Kleds bugs:
There are many of them and I need your help finding them if you have any and up-voting the thread for Riot to see, thank you!
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/oAvUvnLd-gameplay-kled-has-10-bugs-and-counting-all-listed-with-recreation-some-methods
Space Pirate Kled would be amazing!!! Would this be basically Odyssey Kled? This is a great concept!!!
Indeed I put him in the Odyssey universe, but I didn't want to affiliate him with Yasuo's crew so I chose Space pirate instead :) Thanks :D
An awesome concept! Keep it up!!!
the kled skin we really need
One day my friend, we will get the skin Kled really deserve!!

so good


{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
thank you :D
Nice concept but Riot will never do it, they don't like the idea of giving Kled skins that are better than the base one.
aw thank you :3 I still hope that Kled will have awesome skins someday :D
Way better then whatever riot decided to get him for halloween
At least they tried to do a skin for him... *tried*

It's so cool !
I can almost sense that this concept has won a contest, don't know why...
